ps1.8:4.4: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:4.5: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:4.6: Anattani, bhikkhave, attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:4.7: Asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:4.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro saññāvipallāsā cittavipallāsā diṭṭhivipallāsā.
ps1.8:5.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:5.4: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:5.5: Anattani, bhikkhave, anattāti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:5.6: Asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro nasaññāvipallāsā nacittavipallāsā nadiṭṭhivipallāsā”ti.
ps1.8:11.1: Ime cattāro vipallāsā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā, appahīnāti.
ps1.8:11.3: Anicce niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:11.4: Dukkhe sukhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:11.5: Anattani attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:11.6: Asubhe subhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:11.8: Dvīsu vatthūsu dve vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā.
ps1.8:11.9: Catūsu vatthūsu aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnāti.
